metadata.description:
The Dijit@hero collection is a first collection of animated helicopters that highlights the men and women who are dedicated to maritime rescue and rigorous and resilient aeronautical professions. This first collection will give access to inspiring machines that have been built in future collections. Dijit@hero is very excited to unveil this collection. We are thrilled to work towards the positivity and impact that this collection and the world of crypto inspires.

Dijit@hero.
metadata.name: DIJIT@HERO #1
